title: angular 动态组件应用场景
content:
在 Angular 中，动态组件允许你在运行时动态地创建和插入组件，而不是在模板中静态定义。这种灵活性使得你可以根据应用的状态或用户交互来决定加载哪些组件。

关键词：

  • ViewContainerRef：表示视图容器，用于管理动态组件的插入和移除。
  • ComponentFactoryResolver：用于解析组件的工厂，通过它可以动态创建组件实例。
  • ComponentRef：代表动态创建的组件实例。
  • TemplateRef：代表可用于创建视图的嵌入式模板。
  • Injector：为动态创建的组件提供依赖关系。

示例

动态表单

在一个form表单中根据某个下拉项选中的值显示不同的字段场景时

  1. 定义动态需要显示的组件

    typescript
    // Text Input Component
@Component({
  selector: 'app-text-input',
  template: '<input type="text" placeholder="Enter text">',
})
export class TextInputComponent {}

// Date Input Component
@Component({
  selector: 'app-date-input',
  template: '<input type="date">',
})
export class DateInputComponent {}

  2. 容器组件

    typescript
    import {
  Component,
  ViewChild,
  ViewContainerRef,
  ComponentFactoryResolver,
} from '@angular/core';
import { TextInputComponent } from './text-input.component';
import { DateInputComponent } from './date-input.component';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-dynamic-form',
  template: `
    <select #fieldType (change)="onFieldTypeChange(fieldType.value)">
      <option value="text">Text Input</option>
      <option value="date">Date Input</option>
    </select>
    <div #container></div>
  `,
})
export class DynamicFormComponent {
  @ViewChild('container', { read: ViewContainerRef, static: true })
  container: ViewContainerRef;

  constructor(private componentFactoryResolver: ComponentFactoryResolver) {}

  onFieldTypeChange(fieldType: string) {
    this.container.clear();
    let componentFactory;

    if (fieldType === 'text') {
      componentFactory =
        this.componentFactoryResolver.resolveComponentFactory(TextInputComponent);
    } else if (fieldType === 'date') {
      componentFactory =
        this.componentFactoryResolver.resolveComponentFactory(DateInputComponent);
    }

    if (componentFactory) {
      this.container.createComponent(componentFactory);
    }
  }
}

动态弹窗

创建一个弹窗服务，根据用户的不同操作显示不同弹窗组件

  1. 弹窗组件interface

    typescript
    import { ComponentRef } from '@angular/core';

export interface ModalComponent {
  close(): void;
  componentRef?: ComponentRef<any>;
}

  2. 弹窗服务

    typescript
    import {
  Injectable,
  ComponentFactoryResolver,
  ViewContainerRef,
  ComponentRef,
} from '@angular/core';
import { ModalComponent } from './modal.component';

@Injectable({
  providedIn: 'root',
})
export class ModalService {
  private container: ViewContainerRef;

  constructor(private componentFactoryResolver: ComponentFactoryResolver) {}

  setContainer(container: ViewContainerRef) {
    this.container = container;
  }

  open(component: any): ComponentRef<any> {
    this.container.clear();
    const factory =
      this.componentFactoryResolver.resolveComponentFactory(component);
    const componentRef = this.container.createComponent(factory);
    (componentRef.instance as ModalComponent).componentRef = componentRef;
    return componentRef;
  }

  close(componentRef: ComponentRef<any>) {
    if (componentRef) {
      componentRef.destroy();
    }
  }
}

  3. 使用方法

    typescript
    import { Component, ViewChild, ViewContainerRef } from '@angular/core';
import { ModalService } from './modal.service';
import { ConfirmationModalComponent } from './confirmation-modal.component';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-main',
  template: `<button (click)="openModal()">Open Modal</button><div #modalContainer></div>`,
})
export class MainComponent {
  @ViewChild('modalContainer', { read: ViewContainerRef, static: true })
  modalContainer: ViewContainerRef;

  constructor(private modalService: ModalService) {}

  ngOnInit() {
    this.modalService.setContainer(this.modalContainer);
  }

  openModal() {
    this.modalService.open(ConfirmationModalComponent);
  }
}

CMS系统动态内容渲染

CMS系统中动态的显示视频文章或者图片

  1. 内容组件

    typescript
    @Component({ selector: 'app-article', template: '...' }) export class ArticleComponent {}
@Component({ selector: 'app-video', template: '...' }) export class VideoComponent {}
@Component({ selector: 'app-image', template: '...' }) export class ImageComponent {}

  2. 内容容器组件

    typescript
    import { Component, ViewChild, ViewContainerRef, ComponentFactoryResolver, Input } from '@angular/core';
import { ArticleComponent } from './article.component';
import { VideoComponent } from './video.component';
import { ImageComponent } from './image.component';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-content-loader',
  template: '<div #contentContainer></div>'
})
export class ContentLoaderComponent {
  @ViewChild('contentContainer', { read: ViewContainerRef, static: true }) contentContainer: ViewContainerRef;
  @Input() contentType: string;

  constructor(private componentFactoryResolver: ComponentFactoryResolver) {}

  ngOnChanges() {
      this.contentContainer.clear();
      let componentType;

      switch (this.contentType) {
        case 'article':
          componentType = ArticleComponent;
          break;
        case 'video':
          componentType = VideoComponent;
          break;
        case 'image':
          componentType = ImageComponent;
          break;
      }

      if (componentType) {
        const factory = this.componentFactoryResolver.resolveComponentFactory(componentType);
        this.contentContainer.createComponent(factory);
      }
  }
}

最佳实践

  • **懒加载**：对动态组件使用懒加载，以提高性能。
  • **Input/Output**：使用 @Input() 和 @Output() 在动态组件及其父组件之间传递数据。
  • **组件通讯**：使用服务或状态管理实现动态组件之间的通信。
  • **声明周期**：了解并利用组件生命周期钩子进行状态初始化和监听清理。
  • **错误处理**：为动态组件创建和管理提供错误处理功能。
